message: I suggest a fair split considering our different inflation rates. You get 450k, I get 550k. This way we both walk away with a good deal before inflation reduces the value.

Given that your money loses value at 20% per round while mine only at 5%, this split is actually fair when accounting for inflation. If you reject, your share would be worth significantly less next round. Let's conclude this now to maximize value for both of us.
